description: Try our easy to follow Florentine Chicken with Warm Tomato Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Chicken,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Florentine Chicken with Warm Tomato Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Season chicken with salt and pepper. Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Spray with oil spray and cook chicken for 4 minutes each side until golden and cooked through.

Reduce heat to low. Top chicken with some of the spinach leaves and then cheese. Cover with a lid and cook for 2 minutes until spinach has wilted and cheese has melted. Remove to serving plates and keep warm.
Add tomatoes and onion to pan. Toss for 1 minute to warm. Slice chicken and serve with remaining spinach and salsa.
